coredata.dc:title: A further test of pair-potential theory in sodium vapor
coredata.dc:creator: Nelson, R.A.
Leribaux, H.R.
coredata.dc:description:
Abstract
A simple test of pair-potential theory is made for the alkali metal fluids by evaluation of the third virial coefficient of sodium vapor as a function of temperature based on the actual pair potential of sodium. Some corrective measures are proposed.
